name: SimulDrone
description:
"Move the drone where you want it, interact with objects, and enjoy several gameplay elements."

This game is simulation about drone.
A game is simple.
You just move drone and enjoy several gameplay elements.
Also you can enjoy replay-mode about drone.





Record your play and share data with your friends. - With O Key (At the Heliport, you can find on map)

Record Start - Click Button, Record Stop - O Key

You just share your data folder in the Simuldrone installation folder.
(After record of your playing)

How To Play


Drone move - W, A, S, D and Mouse movement.
Turn On / Off drone - Z
Record Canvas On / Off (At the heliport ) - O
Object interact - F and Mouse left click

More about system you can find in the game.

Enjoy SimulDrone
